name: multi_variable_10
description: Test stateful management of 10 variables with diverse types.

turns.query: We're adding a new laptop to our inventory. It's called 'Laptop' in the Electronics category, we have 50 units available out of 100 total stock. Price is $999.99 with a 10% discount rate. It's in stock and featured. Customer reviews are 5, 4, 5 stars. The metadata should include brand 'TechCo' and year 2024.
We just sold 5 laptops! Update the inventory accordingly, apply the discount to the current price, add a new 4-star review, and record the sale of 5 units in the metadata.

We're upgrading this to a Pro model. Append ' Pro' to the product name, make it a 'Premium Electronics' category, increase the price by 20%, bump the discount rate to 20%, remove it from featured items, and mark it as upgraded in the metadata.

Adding a new phone to inventory. Product name is 'Phone', category 'Mobile', 200 available quantity, 500 total stock. Price $599, no discount yet. It's in stock but not featured. No reviews yet. Metadata just has color as black.
Great news! A shipment doubled our phone quantity, we received 200 more units for total stock. It's now a featured product! Someone left a 5-star review. Mark it as restocked in the metadata.

We're discontinuing this phone model. Add '[CLEARANCE]' to the product name, set quantity and stock to zero, cut the price in half, set 50% discount rate, mark as out of stock and not featured. Add clearance flag to metadata.
